name: Apaxrusl
description: The Apaxrusl is a Medium Construct with a fiendish essence, capable of manipulating earth. It can burrow through nonmagical earth and stone without disturbing it, and has a tough exterior.
memorable: Its ability to burrow silently and create fiery sand storms makes it a unique and dangerous combatant.
goals: To engage in physical confrontations and leverage its unique abilities in combat scenarios.
relations: Related to constructs and fiendish creatures, possibly serving fiends or being created by them.
environment: Often found in subterranean environments or areas rich in earth and stone.
strengths: Immunity to fire and poison damage, ability to cause area damage with Fiery Sands, and durability.
weaknesses: Vulnerability to thunder damage and reliance on non-magical materials for abilities.
attacks: It can make two slam attacks that can blind targets, and use fiery sand storms to deal damage to multiple foes.
most_powerful_ability: Fiery Sands, which can damage multiple enemies and create chaos on the battlefield.
senses: Has tremorsense to detect creatures and objects in contact with the ground within 30 feet.
skills: Proficient in Stealth, enhancing its capability to maneuver unseen.
additional_information: Damage immunities include fire and poison.
Condition immunities include charmed, exhausted, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, and poisoned.
The Earth Glide ability allows for stealthy underground movement.
The creature's type is both fiend and construct, affecting interactions with certain features.
Can reduce damage taken using its Shifting Sands reaction.
